reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are things about the Lovelock Inn that I really like. I like that it was built in the 1940s and has some history to it, designed by Paul Revere Williams - you can read about it at http://www.paulrwilliamsproject.org/gallery/lovelock-inn-lovelock-nv/
reviews.title: I really wanted to like it
